name: Welcome Email
body: Welcome to Future Blink! We are excited to have you with us. Explore our platform for more updates and opportunities.

name: Follow-Up Email
body: Follow-up on your existing task. Please review the progress and let us know if there’s anything more we can assist with.

name: Offer Email
body: We are offering a 30% discount on all purchases. Don’t miss out! Grab the offer before it expires.
